nidahasa sadhanaya wenne yayi kiya, dhaneshwaraye wahal bawin galawennata yayi kiya, dakkagena yanne kumana khedaniya anthayakata dayi pahada gannata hakiyawa labenne palanayak wiwechanaya karannata nidahasak athnam pamanaki.
meyata hethuwa, pahadili widiyo dasun labadima samaginma, antharjala sambandhathaෙwan wishala pramanayak labaganima walakwimatayi.
lek hawus ekenma transpot hamba wenawane.
anna ethanayi me prashnaya thibenne.
awurudu jayayi kiyala dana gaththama aawe loku sathutak.
ee sandaha me wana wita, wikirana, shalyakarma, homona saha rasayanika yana prathikarakrama bhawitha kerenawa.

ee sambandhayen sakachcha kara thiranayak ganna bawa niyojya kathanayakawaraya danwa sitiyeya.

ema namayan menehi karamin pinpeth pirima bauddha sithata apamana wu sanasimaki.budun wandimata wiharasthanayakata paminena sardhawantha bauddhayage muwin solosmasthana wandana karana gathawa kiyawena warayak pasa sambudu shri deshaye pahasa windi punyabhumi menehi wimen gatha sitha da sansinduwamin apamana wu suwapath bhawayak danawanu suluya.
ada janadhipathiwaraya kanthawanta thiyena atha heta purusha pakshaya langadith thiyanna bari kamak naha.
emenma, pol alan thama paudgalika dhanaskandhayen widyawa, adhyapanaya saha wanajiwi sanrakshanaya wani katayuthu wenuwen a.do. biliyana 2kata wadi midulak parithyaga kala ayekuda weyi.
